data.message: Run full E2E test of Cinematch and provide UX review: Created Playwright test script, tested all 12 pages (homepage, login, dashboard, discover, profile, profile edit, inbox, briefs, opportunities, shortlist, settings, pricing). All pages loaded successfully. Provided detailed UX feedback: 8/10 overall, strong visual design, identified test data in inbox and missing nav active states as issues.
data.task: Run full E2E test of Cinematch and provide UX review
